data.title: Cheap Accommodation Pretoria
data.meta_description: The SUN1 Pretoria hotel is amazing value with our cheap per room rates. The hotel is well located in the CBD and offers a no-frills, no-fuss good night’s sleep.
data.text:
SUN1 Pretoria

Budget Friendly Hotel in Pretoria

SUN1 Pretoria offers guests modern, comfortable hotel accommodation at budget rates in Pretoria, South Africa. Conveniently located in the Pretoria CBD, close to embassies and government offices the SUN1 Pretoria hotel features rooms suited for up to 3 guests sharing. Enjoy free property-wide WiFi, secure free parking and bottomless coffee in our public area during your stay at the SUN1 Pretoria.

Stay at SUN1 Pretoria and enjoy convenient accommodation at affordable rates in Pretoria.

BOOK ANY SUN1 HOTEL

Smarter Choice

Accommodation at SUN1 Pretoria

SUN1 Pretoria has 135 hotel rooms with an extra length queen sized and separate bunk bed which is ideal for adults or kids sharing.

Amenities

Hotel rooms are equipped with en-suite showers, TV, air-conditioning, working area with USB plug points and LED-lighting.

Services

Guests at SUN1 Pretoria can enjoy a good night’s rest in a warm, comfortable bed.

Booking Terms & Conditions
